Custom logging function that wraps cli messaging

Source: R/util-cli_logger_wrappers.R
LogMessage.Rd

Custom logging function that wraps cli messaging

Usage

LogMessage(level, message, cli_detail = NULL, .envir = parent.frame())

Arguments

level

logger levels

message

message to display; may contain glue-style placeholders

cli_detail

for cli style alerts the detail for info

.envir

the environment for glue expressions

On this page

Developed by George Wu, Jeremy Wildfire, Matt Roumaya, Spencer Childress, Laura Maxwell, Jacob Anderson, Jon Harmon, Zelos Zhu, Nathan Kosiba, Douglas Sanders, Li Ge, Zhongkai Wang, Colleen McLaughlin, Chelsea Dickens, Maya Gans, Anne Zheng, Devin Pastoor.
